DESCRIPTION: View the profile card of yourself or a user with a certain background.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: » The profile card shows all your:
EXTENDED_LINE_3: • XP status of your current global & server XP level.

EXTENDED_LINE_7: » Use the **{{prefix}}background** command to select your custom background.
